message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'll really appreciate. My starting price is $120. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $100 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $110, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down a little more, to $105. This is a final offer from me, so I hope you'll consider it carefully.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $98, but that's as high as I can go.
Bob, I understand you're working with a tight budget, but $98 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you at $100. This would give us both a fair deal. What do you say?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $97.50, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
